name: Statute of frauds inapplicable
text: §490:8-113  Statute of frauds inapplicable.  A contract or modification of a contract for the sale or purchase of a security is enforceable whether or not there is a writing signed or record authenticated by a party against whom enforcement is sought, even if the contract or modification is not capable of performance within one year of its making. [L 1997, c 33, pt of §2]
